title: 🔥2 bedroom/1 bathroom +Home office!Pet friendly!
posting_body: Relax and unwind - you can stop dreaming and start living!Spacious 2 bedrooom +Home office with a bonus room in Chicago's Little Village/Pilsen neighborhood.
The apartment features a large eat in kitchen,new hardwood floors and an updated bathroom.
There is laundry on the premises!
Steps from California Pink Line stop.
One block walk to the 21 Cermak bus.

Two blocks walk to Sip 22 Coffee Lounge, Maria Saucedo Academy, Farragut Academy, Little Village Branch Public Library; short walk to Pete's Fresh Market, Douglas Park (Riot Fest), Mt. Sinai and Saint Anthony Hospitals.
Short L ride to Rush/UIC Medical District and University of Illinois at Chicago.
Building is professionally managed and secure.
Water is included in rent.
Tenant pays electric and heat.
Laundry in building.
All well qualified tenants must have:
- One month rent due at lease signing
- $325 administrative move-in fee only one time non-refundable
- $30 application fee.
- No deposit needed.
- Water included in rent, other utilities are the responsibility of the tenant.
- Pets up to 35LB pounds are welcomed,no aggressive breeds please
Tenants' monthly income, rental history, and credit scores are used to review your application.
Credit scores of 600+ are ideal but willing to work with certain situations.
No evictions.
If you're fine with the requirements and would like to schedule a showing contact Lucy via text message at 773 877 9647 or email.
